query:
SELECT 
  p.id as purchase_id,
  p.orderNumber,
  p.areaId,
  p.isExcluded,
  pm.id as pm_id,
  pm.status as pm_status,
  pm.rawAreaText
FROM purchases p
LEFT JOIN pending_matches pm ON pm.purchaseId = p.id
WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000935'
